REACH Next 2016

September 22, 2016

REACH NeXT is a one day pitch showdown to spring board the most brilliant and pioneering minds in tech. As a collaboration between TechZulu, Gadget Review and Rhubarb Studios, our mission with REACH NeXT is to deliver a day of VALUE and awareness with the ever-changing innovation surrounding us, so you walk away feeling informed, inspired, and connected. In an effort to create a truly unique experience, attendance will be limited to no more than 1000 people, consisting of startups, top-tier talent, members of the press and prominent venture funds. So apply to pitch or register to attend for what will be an unforgettable day.

1,000 Attendees

Exchange LA, 618 South Spring Street
Los Angeles, CA 90014

Male, 42 y.o. from California
